description: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
info: For strength heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed and 0.15% movement speed.
For agility heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed and 3 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed and 0.15% movement speed.
